26 #pragma once
27 
28 #if ENABLE(SVG_FONTS)
29 
30 #include "CachedFont.h"
31 
32 namespace WebCore {
33 
34 class SVGFontFaceElement;
35 
36 class CachedSVGFont final : public CachedFont {
37 public:
38     CachedSVGFont(CachedResourceRequest&&, const PAL::SessionID&, const CookieJar*);
39 
40     bool ensureCustomFontData(const AtomicString& remoteURI) override;
41 
42     RefPtr<Font> createFont(const FontDescription&, const AtomicString& remoteURI, bool syntheticBold, bool syntheticItalic, const FontFeatureSettings&, const FontVariantSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities) override;
43 
44 private:
45     FontPlatformData platformDataFromCustomData(const FontDescription&, bool bold, bool italic, const FontFeatureSettings&, const FontVariantSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities);
46 
47     SVGFontElement* getSVGFontById(const String&) const;
48 
49     SVGFontElement* maybeInitializeExternalSVGFontElement(const AtomicString& remoteURI);
50     SVGFontFaceElement* firstFontFace(const AtomicString& remoteURI);
51 
52     RefPtr<SharedBuffer> m_convertedFont;
53     RefPtr<SVGDocument> m_externalSVGDocument;
54     SVGFontElement* m_externalSVGFontElement;
55 };
56 
57 } // namespace WebCore
58 
59 SPECIALIZE_TYPE_TRAITS_CACHED_RESOURCE(CachedSVGFont, CachedResource::Type::SVGFontResource)
60 
61 #endif // ENABLE(SVG_FONTS)

26 #pragma once
27 
28 #if ENABLE(SVG_FONTS)
29 
30 #include "CachedFont.h"
31 
32 namespace WebCore {
33 
34 class SVGFontFaceElement;
35 
36 class CachedSVGFont final : public CachedFont {
37 public:
38     CachedSVGFont(CachedResourceRequest&&, const PAL::SessionID&, const CookieJar*);
39 
40     bool ensureCustomFontData(const AtomString& remoteURI) override;
41 
42     RefPtr<Font> createFont(const FontDescription&, const AtomString& remoteURI, bool syntheticBold, bool syntheticItalic, const FontFeatureSettings&, const FontVariantSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities) override;
43 
44 private:
45     FontPlatformData platformDataFromCustomData(const FontDescription&, bool bold, bool italic, const FontFeatureSettings&, const FontVariantSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities);
46 
47     SVGFontElement* getSVGFontById(const String&) const;
48 
49     SVGFontElement* maybeInitializeExternalSVGFontElement(const AtomString& remoteURI);
50     SVGFontFaceElement* firstFontFace(const AtomString& remoteURI);
51 
52     RefPtr<SharedBuffer> m_convertedFont;
53     RefPtr<SVGDocument> m_externalSVGDocument;
54     SVGFontElement* m_externalSVGFontElement;
55 };
56 
57 } // namespace WebCore
58 
59 SPECIALIZE_TYPE_TRAITS_CACHED_RESOURCE(CachedSVGFont, CachedResource::Type::SVGFontResource)
60 
61 #endif // ENABLE(SVG_FONTS)
